signup.title: Create Account
signup.agreeToTermsLabel: Agree to our terms and conditions
signup.agreeToTermsDescription: By signing up, you agree to our

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address.
validation.termsRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password?
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
forgotPassword.toastSuccessDescription: If an account exists for {email}, you will receive password reset instructions.
forgotPassword.submittedDescription: Please check your inbox at {email} for the next steps.

platformSettings.title: Platform Settings
platformSettings.description: Manage global settings for the ResumeMatch AI platform.

validation.platformNameMin: Platform name must be at least 3 characters.
validation.maxJobPostingDaysMin: Max job posting days must be at least 1.
validation.maxJobPostingDaysMax: Max job posting days cannot exceed 365.
validation.maxResumesMin: Max resume uploads must be at least 1.
validation.sessionTimeoutMin: Session timeout must be at least 5 minutes.
validation.sessionTimeoutMax: Session timeout cannot exceed 1440 minutes (24 hours).
validation.maxEventRegistrationsMin: Max event registrations must be at least 1.
validation.pointsForAffiliateMin: Points for affiliate signup must be non-negative.

settingsSaved.title: Settings Saved
settingsSaved.description: Platform settings have been successfully updated.

platformName.label: Platform Name
platformName.description: The name displayed across the platform.

maintenanceMode.label: Maintenance Mode
maintenanceMode.description: Enable to take the platform offline for users.

defaultProfileVisibility.label: Default Profile Visibility
defaultProfileVisibility.description: Set the default visibility for new user profiles.

maxResumesPerUser.label: Max Resume Uploads per User
maxResumesPerUser.description: Limit for resume profiles a user can create/upload.

defaultTheme.label: Default Theme
defaultTheme.description: Set the default theme for new users.

enablePublicProfilePages.label: Enable Public Profile Pages
enablePublicProfilePages.description: Allow users to have publicly accessible profile URLs.

sessionTimeoutMinutes.label: Session Timeout (Minutes)
sessionTimeoutMinutes.description: Inactive user sessions will expire after this duration.

globalAnnouncement.label: Global Announcement Bar Text
globalAnnouncement.description: Text displayed in a banner across the platform (leave empty to hide).
globalAnnouncement.placeholder: e.g., New features launched! Check out...

autoModeratePosts.label: Enable AI Auto-Moderation for Posts
autoModeratePosts.description: If enabled, AI will attempt to flag potentially inappropriate content.

maxJobPostingDays.label: Max Job Posting Duration (Days)
maxJobPostingDays.description: How long job posts remain active by default.

xpForLogin.label: XP for Daily Login
xpForLogin.description: Points awarded for daily active use.

xpForNewPost.label: XP for New Community Post
xpForNewPost.description: Points awarded for creating a post.

pointsForAffiliateSignup.label: Points for Successful Affiliate Signup
pointsForAffiliateSignup.description: Points awarded to referrer when an affiliate signup is completed.

defaultAppointmentCost.label: Default Cost for Booking Alumni Appointment (Coins)

maxEventRegistrationsPerUser.label: Max Event Registrations per User
maxEventRegistrationsPerUser.description: Limit for active event registrations per user.

tenantCustomization.description: Control what aspects tenants can customize for their instance.

allowTenantCustomBranding.label: Allow Tenants to Customize Branding
allowTenantCustomBranding.description: If enabled, tenant managers can upload logos and set theme colors.

allowTenantEmailCustomization.label: Allow Tenants to Customize Email Templates
allowTenantEmailCustomization.description: If enabled, tenant managers can modify certain outgoing email templates.

tenantManagement.title: Tenant Management
tenantManagement.description: Oversee and manage all organizational tenants on the platform.
tenantManagement.noTenantsFound: No tenants have been onboarded yet. Click 'Create New Tenant' to get started.
tenantManagement.editActionMock: Edit action for tenant {tenantId} is a mock.
tenantManagement.deleteActionToast: Tenant {tenantId} and associated data would be removed (mock).

errorPage.title: Something Went Wrong
errorPage.description: We're sorry, but an unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.

accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.message: You do not have permission to view this page or perform this action.

dailyChallenge.title: Daily Interview Challenge
dailyChallenge.footerNote: A new challenge is posted every day. Practice regularly to improve your interview skills!

newChallenge.title: New Challenge Loaded
newChallenge.description: A new technical challenge has been fetched for you.

showHint.title: Hint
showHint.noHint: No specific hint available for this question.

submitMock.title: Submission Received (Mock)
submitMock.description: In a real app, your answer would be evaluated. This feature is coming soon!

translateTool.title: Translation Tool
translateTool.enterTextPlaceholder: Type any word or sentence here...
translateTool.errorTranslating: An error occurred while translating. Please try again.

alumniConnect.title: Alumni Directory
alumniConnect.pageDescription: Connect with fellow alumni. Discover skills, interests, and potential collaborators.
alumniConnect.distinguishedDesc: Spotlight on our accomplished alumni making an impact.
alumniConnect.tryAdjusting: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.
alumniConnect.bookDesc: Complete the form below to request a meeting.
alumniConnect.messagePlaceholder: Any additional details for your request.
alumniConnect.feeNotice_part2: coins will be deducted upon confirmation.

affiliates.title: Affiliates Program
affiliates.pageDescription: Partner with ResumeMatch AI, share with your network, and earn commissions!
affiliates.detailsDesc: Use this code or link to promote ResumeMatch AI.
affiliates.performanceDesc: Track your clicks, signups, and earnings.
affiliates.noSignups: No signups through your affiliate link yet.
affiliates.commissionProcessNote: Commissions are typically processed at the end of each month.
affiliates.step1: 1. Share your unique affiliate code or link.
affiliates.step2: 2. When someone signs up using your link and subscribes to a paid plan (if applicable), you earn a commission.
affiliates.step3: 3. Track your performance and earnings in this dashboard.
affiliates.step4: 4. Payouts are typically made monthly via [Payment Method - e.g., PayPal].

activityLog.title: Activity Log
activityLog.description: A log of your recent actions and system events within ResumeMatch AI.

appointments.noScheduled: You have no appointments or assigned requests.
appointments.rescheduleDesc: Suggest a new time for your appointment with {user}
appointments.toastCompletedDesc: The appointment has been marked as complete.
appointments.toastDeclinedDesc: The appointment request has been declined.
appointments.toastFeedbackDesc: Thank you for your feedback on your session with {user}.
appointments.toastJoinMeetingDesc: This would launch the video conferencing link.
appointments.toastRescheduleDesc: A reschedule request has been sent to {user}.
appointments.toastScheduleNewDesc: Please use the Alumni Directory to book appointments.
appointments.pageDescription: View and manage your scheduled appointments, mock interviews, and assigned community requests.
appointments.provideFeedbackDesc: Share your thoughts on the session with {user}.
appointments.title: My Appointments
appointments.whatWentWell: What went well? Any areas for improvement?

blog.createPageDescription: Share your knowledge and insights with the community. Write a blog post on a topic relevant to career development, networking, or your industry.
blog.titlePlaceholder: e.g., 5 Tips for a Killer Resume
blog.excerptPlaceholder: A brief, catchy summary of your post (150-200 characters).
blog.contentPlaceholder: Write your full blog post here. Use Markdown for formatting like ## Headings and **bold** text.
blog.toastCreatedDesc: Your blog post has been published.
blog.title: Blog & Insights
blog.noArticlesHint: There are no blog posts yet. Why not be the first to create one?

bookmarks.title: My Bookmarks
bookmarks.noPosts: You haven't bookmarked any community posts yet.
bookmarks.noBlogs: You haven't bookmarked any blog articles yet.
bookmarks.noQuestions: You haven't bookmarked any interview questions yet.
bookmarks.noResumeScans: You haven't bookmarked any resume scan reports yet.

gallery.title: Event Gallery
gallery.pageDescription: A visual journey through our past events, workshops, and meetups.
gallery.noEventsHint: Check back later for photos from our upcoming events!
gallery.participantListDesc: List of users who attended this event.
gallery.noParticipants: No participant data available for this event.
gallery.noImages: No images available for this event.

gamification.title: Rewards & Badges
gamification.pageDescription: Track your XP, daily streak, and earned badges.
gamification.badgesDescription: Badges are awarded for completing tasks and milestones on the platform. Hover over a badge to see what it's for.
gamification.leaderboardDescription: See how you rank against other users based on XP points.

jobBoard.title: Job Board
jobBoard.pageDescription: Find your next opportunity. Explore job openings posted by alumni and partner companies.
jobBoard.searchPlaceholder: Search by title, company, or keyword...

jobTracker.title: Job Application Tracker
jobTracker.searchHint: Search for jobs on external platforms and add them to your tracker.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.completionTooltip: Complete your profile to unlock more features and get better recommendations.
profile.aiSkillDesc: Get AI-powered skill suggestions based on your profile.
profile.aiAnalyzing: AI is analyzing your profile for skill suggestions...
profile.noSkillSuggestions: No new skill suggestions at this time. Ensure your bio and career interests are filled out!
profile.savedDesc: Your profile information has been updated.

wallet.usageHint: Use coins to book appointments with alumni mentors.
wallet.addFundsToastDesc: This would lead to a payment gateway to add more coins.
